posts.title: Wall-E And Eve Mug Set
posts.content: After helping all the obese people off their floaties, Wall-E and Eve are here to help with your morning coffee. The Wall-E and Eve mug set are the novelty ceramic mugs designed to look like miniature versions of the most lovable robots you’ve ever met.

posts.title: Man Up Book
posts.content: You’re a strong independent man who never asks for directions – but are you a skilled expert in bear fighting, business negotiations, erotic foreplay, and other must have skills? If not – you need to read the “Man Up” book which contains 367 skills for the modern man.

posts.title: Pizza Oven Grill
posts.content: With the pizza oven grill kit you’ll be able to enjoy a delicious home cooked pie during every Sunday BBQ. The stainless steel attachment instantly transforms your kettle grill into a genuine coal burning pizza oven. You’ll never have to settle for a frozen pizza again.

posts.title: The Stealth Beer Koozie
posts.content: Keep your raging alcoholism under wraps by disguising your booze in this stealth beer koozie. This clever lid fits over any beer can which can then be placed in a standard coffee cup, creating an insulated and discreet koozie to drink your beer from.

posts.title: Fuel Can Utility Tool Box
posts.content: Hide your tools in plain sight while you’re at the job site by storing them inside this fuel can utility tool box. It’s designed with a lift out tool tray, removable drawers, screw driver storage slots, and a locking mechanism as an added safety measure.

posts.title: Indoors Fireworks Show
posts.content: Enjoy an amazing display of lights from the comfort of your couch with the indoor fireworks show. There’s no need to wait for holidays anymore, simply turn off the lights and project an extraordinary and realistic show that’ll leave the family breathless.

posts.title: You Suck At Parking Cards
posts.content: Why keep your mouth shut when you see someone who parks like a total a-hole? Let them know exactly what you think of their disgraceful parking job using these colorful “you suck at parking” cards. They measure 3.5″ x 2″ and come in packs of 50.

posts.title: Automatic Sliding Door System
posts.content: Now you can have the doors in your own home automatically slide open just like they do in retail stores with this automatic sliding door system. This DIY kit includes everything you need to upgrade your doors automatic sliders, giving your home a modern feel.

posts.title: Inflatable Fishing Boat
posts.content: Execute an impromptu fishing trip whenever the mood strikes with the inflatable fishing boat. Featuring a padded seat, adjustable backrest, and bottle holders – you can fish in utter comfort without having to spends thousands on an expensive boat.

posts.title: Netted Cocoon Hammock
posts.content: With the netted cocooon hammock you can hang out in your backyard or in the wilderness without having mosquitoes invade your quiet personal space. The netted hammock features a mesh canopy that lets fresh air breeze through while filtering out annoying insects.

posts.title: Jewelry Cabinet Mirror
posts.content: Keep your room looking tidy by storing all your accessories inside this jewelry cabinet mirror. This tilting 43 inch long mirror’s space-saving design features a slim yet spacious storage cabinet with 48 necklace hooks, 6 lined shelves, and a bracelet rod.

posts.title: Backyard Mini Golf Set
posts.content: Give your dull yard a fun carnival feel using this backyard mini gold set. The set comes with a series of brightly colored plastic pieces that you can place anywhere in order to create an impromptu mini golf court where you can practice and perfect your putting.
